text: Héctor Santiago Tapia Urdile or just "Tito Tapia" (born 30 September 1977) is a former football player and manager. == Career == Tapia has played for Colo Colo, Universidad Católica, Palestino and Unión Española in Chile, Cruzeiro in Brazil, Lille OSC in France, Perugia in Italy and FC Thun in Switzerland. In 2008 Tapia received an offer from Royal Excelsior Mouscron, but he decided to stay at La Católica. In 2013 Tapia began his manager career at Colo-Colo.Tapia rescates Colo-Colo Since 24 April 2018 he has been coaching Colo-Colo for the second time in his career. == International == Tapia debuted for his country in 1997 and has 14 caps and 3 goals.Cruzeiro rescinde contrato de Tapia e confirma permanência de Maldonado ===International goals=== {| class="wikitable" ! # !!
